name: OCR RecSys Development (Cloud-Optimized)
postCreateCommand: uv sync && uv pip install -e . --no-deps && [ -d /workspaces/node_modules_global ] && npm config set prefix /workspaces/node_modules_global || true && ~/.pyenv/bin/pyenv install 3.11.4 && ~/.pyenv/bin/pyenv global 3.11.4 && git config --global user.name 'Wchoi189' && git config --global user.email 'wchoi189@gmail.com' && git config --global init.defaultBranch main && git lfs install && export GITHUB_PAT=$(grep '^GITHUB_PAT=' .env.local | cut -d'=' -f2 | tr -d '"') && [ -n "$GITHUB_PAT" ] && export GH_TOKEN=$GITHUB_PAT && git config --global credential.helper store && echo "https://Wchoi189:$GITHUB_PAT@github.com" >> ~/.git-credentials && source setup-env.sh && bash experiment_manager/install-etk.sh
postStartCommand: bash .devcontainer/scripts/start-mcp-servers.sh && python scripts/validate_environment.py && nohup uv run python scripts/mcp/unified_server.py --transport sse --port 8000 > /tmp/mcp.log 2>&1 & || echo '⚠️ Validation incomplete'
